title: java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException com.vladmihalcea.hibernate.type.json.internal.JsonSqlTypeDescriptor with Hibernate Reactive
body:
### Describe the bug

I'm trying to use `implementation 'com.vladmihalcea:hibernate-types-52:2.14.0'` from https://github.com/vladmihalcea/hibernate-types in my application, which previously worked with the non-reactive dependencies.


```
@Getter
@Setter
@Entity
@NoArgsConstructor
@AllArgsConstructor
@Table(name = "my_entity")
@TypeDefs({
        @TypeDef(name = "json", typeClass = JsonType.class)
})
public class MyEntity extends PanacheEntity {

    @Type(type = "json")
    @Column(columnDefinition = "jsonb")
    private Map<String, Object> properties = new HashMap<>();

}


```

```
2022-02-03 08:42:19,971 ERROR [com.lau.aut.reg.RegistrationResource] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-9) Failed to register user: javax.persistence.PersistenceException: org.hibernate.HibernateException: java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
```

Are there any plans to support those types or is it rather something that has to be done on Vlad Mihalcea's side?
